    • Method Detail

      • extractTopK

        public com.yahoo.bullet.parsing.Aggregation extractTopK(Set<Expression> groupByFields,
                                                        Optional<Long> threshold,
                                                        Optional<Long> size)
                                                 throws NullPointerException
        Extract a Aggregation.Type#TOP_K Aggregation.
        Parameters:
        groupByFields - The non-null Set of Expression in the BQL GROUP BY clause.
        threshold - The non-null Optional of threshold of this TopK aggregation.
        size - The non-null Optional of size of this TopK aggregation.
        Returns:
        A Aggregation.Type#TOP_K Aggregation.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - when any of groupByFields, threshold and size is null.

      • extractGroup

        public com.yahoo.bullet.parsing.Aggregation extractGroup(Set<Expression> selectFields,
                                                         Set<Expression> groupByFields,
                                                         Optional<Long> size)
                                                  throws NullPointerException,
                                                         ParsingException
        Extract a Aggregation.Type#GROUP Aggregation.
        Parameters:
        selectFields - The non-null Set of Expression in the BQL SELECT clause.
        groupByFields - The non-null Set of Expression in the BQL GROUP BY clause.
        size - The non-null Optional of size of this group aggregation.
        Returns:
        A Aggregation.Type#GROUP Aggregation.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - when any of selectFields, groupByFields and size is null.
        ParsingException - when any of selectionField is not grouping function nor in group by clause.

      • extractRaw

        public com.yahoo.bullet.parsing.Aggregation extractRaw(Optional<Long> size)
                                                throws NullPointerException
        Extract a Aggregation.Type#RAW Aggregation.
        Parameters:
        size - The non-null size from BQL LIMIT clause.
        Returns:
        A Aggregation.Type#RAW Aggregation.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - when size is null.
